data.lyric:
[ti:Bluebird]
[ar:Miranda Lambert]
[al:Bluebird]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bluebird - Miranda Lambert
[00:00.13]Lyrics by：Miranda Lambert/Luke Dick/Natalie Hemby
[00:00.26]Composed by：Miranda Lambert/Luke Dick/Natalie Hemby
[00:00.39]Ooh
[00:06.18]Ooh
[00:12.31]Yeah I'm a turner
[00:15.12]I turn pages all the time
[00:18.38]Don't like where I'm at
[00:20.04]34 was bad so I just turn to 35
[00:23.93]Yeah I'm a keeper
[00:26.74]I keep digging down for the deep
[00:29.98]Like the records I'm playing
[00:31.60]They might keep you waiting
[00:32.85]But you know I'm only playing for keeps
[00:35.81]And if the house just keeps on winning
[00:38.59]I got a wildcard up on my sleeve
[00:41.41]And if love keeps giving me lemons
[00:44.43]I'll just mix 'em in my drink
[00:47.32]And if the whole wide world stops singing
[00:50.61]And all the stars go dark
[00:52.86]I'll keep a light on in my soul
[00:55.93]Keep a bluebird in my heart
[01:10.87]Well I'm a giver
[01:13.86]Yeah and I'm still giving 'em hell
[01:17.15]Forgiving's pretty hard
[01:18.44]So I made an art out of forgettin' 'em well
[01:22.48]Yeah I'm a rhymer
[01:25.29]I can turn 20 cents into a 10
[01:28.39]And if I get confused and I start to lose
[01:31.24]I rhyme a dime 'til it all makes sense
[01:34.23]And if the house just keeps on winning
[01:37.16]I got a wildcard up on my sleeve
[01:40.10]And if love keeps giving me lemons
[01:42.97]I'll just mix 'em in my drink
[01:45.88]And if the whole wide world stops singing
[01:49.16]And all the stars go dark
[01:51.42]I turn a light on in my soul
[01:54.41]And keep a bluebird in my heart
[01:57.38]Ooh
[02:03.23]Ooh
[02:23.87]And if the house just keeps on winning
[02:26.87]I got a wildcard up on my sleeve
[02:29.80]And if love starts giving me lemons
[02:32.92]Just mix 'em in my drink
[02:35.65]And if the whole wide world stops singing
[02:38.87]And all the stars go dark
[02:41.00]I'll keep a light on in my soul
[02:44.23]Keep a bluebird in my heart
[02:47.07]I'll keep a light on in my soul
[02:50.05]Keep a bluebird in my heart
[02:54.79]Keep a bluebird in my heart
[03:01.83]Ooh
[03:06.65]And the bluebird sings
[03:13.48]Ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Bluebird]
[ar:Miranda Lambert]
[al:Bluebird]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.26]//
[00:00.39]//
[00:06.18]//
[00:12.31]我是个喜欢变化的人
[00:15.12]我总是在不停地变
[00:18.38]不喜欢我现在的状态
[00:20.04]三十四岁不快乐 所以我变成三十五岁
[00:23.93]我是个看护者
[00:26.74]我总是喜欢追根究底
[00:29.98]就像我播放的唱片
[00:31.60]他们可能会让你苦苦等候
[00:32.85]但你知道我做这一切都是很认真的
[00:35.81]如果我的对手总是胜我一筹
[00:38.59]我就使用手中的万能牌
[00:41.41]如果爱情总是给我带来不幸
[00:44.43]那我也要积极面对
[00:47.32]如果全世界都不再歌唱
[00:50.61]星星黯淡无光
[00:52.86]我会留一盏灯 照亮我的灵魂
[00:55.93]让知更鸟在我心中歌唱
[01:10.87]我是个给予者
[01:13.86]我还是在给他们带来烦恼
[01:17.15]原谅别人真的很难做到
[01:18.44]于是我只能忘记他们 把这当做一种艺术
[01:22.48]我是个打油诗人
[01:25.29]我可以把二十分钱变成十分
[01:28.39]如果我感到困惑 将要失败
[01:31.24]我就作一首诗 直到一切都说得通为止
[01:34.23]如果我的对手总是胜我一筹
[01:37.16]我就使用手中的万能牌
[01:40.10]如果爱情总是给我带来不幸
[01:42.97]那我也要积极面对
[01:45.88]如果全世界都不再歌唱
[01:49.16]星星黯淡无光
[01:51.42]我在心中点燃一盏灯
[01:54.41]让知更鸟在我心中歌唱
[01:57.38]//
[02:03.23]//
[02:23.87]如果我的对手总是胜我一筹
[02:26.87]我就使用手中的万能牌
[02:29.80]如果爱情开始给我带来不幸
[02:32.92]我也会积极面对
[02:35.65]如果全世界都不再歌唱
[02:38.87]星星黯淡无光
[02:41.00]我会留一盏灯 照亮我的灵魂
[02:44.23]让知更鸟在我心中歌唱
[02:47.07]我会留一盏灯 照亮我的灵魂
[02:50.05]让知更鸟在我心中歌唱
[02:54.79]让知更鸟在我心中歌唱
[03:01.83]//
[03:06.65]知更鸟唱着歌谣
[03:13.48]//
